headline: Monkey D. Luffy
description: Captain of the Straw Hat Pirates aiming to become the Pirate King by finding the legendary treasure, One Piece.

headline: Marineford War
description: A massive confrontation between Marines and Whitebeard Pirates, marking a significant turning point in pirate history.

headline: Enies Lobby Arc
description: An important storyline where the Straw Hats rescue Nico Robin from the World Government.

headline: Portgas D. Ace
description: Commander of Whitebeard's second division and Luffy's sworn brother, whose capture sparked the Marineford War.

headline: Gol D. Roger
description: The legendary Pirate King whose final words sparked the Great Pirate Era.

headline: Zoro's Promise
description: Roronoa Zoro vows never to lose again after his defeat by Mihawk.

headline: Nami Joins the Crew
description: After Arlong's defeat, navigator Nami officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates.

headline: Dressrosa Arc
description: An extensive arc involving the Straw Hat Pirates' clash against Donquixote Doflamingo, liberating Dressrosa.

headline: Gear Fourth
description: Monkey D. Luffy's powerful transformation first revealed during the battle against Doflamingo.

headline: Whole Cake Island
description: Arc featuring the Straw Hats' infiltration of Big Mom's territory to rescue Sanji.
